string-array.name: facts
string-array.item: "I never knew my titties was bigger than Pamela. So paparazzi flickin’ be flickin’ they camera."
"Why did you envy? Why you go against me when I got trendy? Why you ain’t commend me?"
"Just for the record: get wetter than a fisherman"
"Nicki ain’t a rapper, she’s a brander"
“All these bitches is my sons”
“Got’damn, aint even pregnant, But i’m birthin bitches”
“F-ck I look like ho? I look like yes and ya look like no.”
“I got that kinda money that make a bitch broke bitter.”
“Please you can never compare to me, all these bi**hes is scared of me. I am who they couldn’t even dare to be”
“I’m the baddest in the game. Excuse me, honey. Nobody’s in my lane.”
“So far ahead, these bums is laggin’”
“Is this the thanks that I get for puttin’ you bitches on?”
“If you ain’t shittin’, then get off the pot.”
“I’m the mothafuckin’ boss, overwrite.”
“Pu**y real good, it taste like mango”
“I had to laugh at dat one, bitch get outta line I’m a slap da fat one”
“I keep three hoes, But don`t call me Santa”
“Bitch I ball no peep show; dead ass no peep show!”
“All my New York broads spend chips in the village.”
“I’m like 5’2 my S.A.T. scores was high too.”
“If he work the middle like a mohawl, tell ‘em he can meet me where them girls say Aloha”
“I think better with thick chicks with lip stick.”
“These broke rappers always rappin bout a pink truck, I’m only happy wen I hoppin’ out da brincks truck”
“If you don’t have critics, you probably don’t have success either.”
“You be yellin boom-boom; When you really poom-poom.”
“Now All These Bitches Wanna Try And Be My Bestie. But I Take A Left And Leave Em Hanging Like A Testie”
“I just give him a wink; what the f**k did ya think?”
“Roscoe’s on his knees with a snot nose”
“I eat these rap bitches, somebody get me a dinner mint”
“These broke rappers always rappin bout a pink truck, I’m only happy wen I hoppin’ out da brincks truck”
“Young Money Nicki, Bad Boy Cassie.You wanna minaj? Now lets get nasty.”
“What the fuck I look like bitch, I run this town.”
“Why don’t you just sit back or dance? Sorry we don’t chit-chat with fans”
“Bitch won’t blow, but she can blow my saxophone”
“Nicki sexy any time of day”
“See I’m a hater, I go hard. Listen let’s begin. You know her last name Minaj, she a lesbian”
“All I do is sign boobs and be taking pics. Got the new benz the color of bacon bits.”
“Once upon a time not long ago lived a chick named Nicki wit a naughty flow”
“Defend my honor – Protect my pride”
“So I’ma bounce back, and I’ma ball out, and everytime you see me I’ma go all out, and I’ma win til the ending.”
“You could be the King, but watch the Queen conquer”
“I think big, get cash, make ‘em blink fast”
“Can I get that tron? Can I get that remy? Can I get that coke? Can I get that henny?”
“Similes, metaphors and we pop pills. Sick flow inundated with the doc bills.Work hard, now we know how to top bills; in the middle of the street doing cartwheels.”
“You like me, you don’t like me, you love me, you hate me.I’m gonna be me, but one thing I have to back it up is skills.”
“Control my mind – Capture my soul”
“Nigga got the peep hole to my soul.”
“And if he think I like him then he might be right”
“Muahhhh me love you long time like I’m asian”
“Bitches is like crabs in a butcket. You see a bad bitch gettin shine you should love it “
“I know you love her, but I love you”
“Pull up in the monster; Automobile gangster with a bad b-tch that came from Sri Lanka”
“Yeah I’m in that Tonka, color of Willy Wonka”
“And I’m all up all up all up in the bank with the funny face. And if I’m fake I aint notice cause my money aint”
“And when he spank this I make that pu**y fart. I’m such an actress, Melissa Joan Hart.”
“When you was on stage with ya brain on drugs, Nick Nack Carry Crack what my nickname was”
“On a diet, but I’m doing donuts in the six speed.”
“White boys tell me that I rock like guitars”
“My pu**y on another planet; got that NASA pu**y”
“Cause you thought you’d win, but I knew you’d lose honey. I’m flyer than altitude cruise”
“Shoutout to my haters, sorry that you couldn’t phase me.”
“Nicki Minaj is who you ain’t fu*kin’ with”
“If you ain’t shi**in’, then get off the pot”
“Why are you speaking when no one asked you?”
“Just for the record, I’m all that I can be, and I’ll admit I’m appauled when you envy.”
“This one goes out to all my critics: don’t you feel stupid? Look how I did it. Look how it came to pass when I said it.”
“I believe that life is a prize.”
“Days of our lives, you wink it goes by.”
“May the lord protect me as the world gets hectic; My voice projected my life reflected”
“To live doesn’t mean your alive”
“I am so territorial, that I just felt like whatever I was gonna do I was gonna write it myself, its my personal preference to always be in control of everything I do in life.”
"Thumbs up like im hailin a yellow cab, My flow NUTS like M&Ms in a yellow bag"
“I Been Bad Since Sticky Hands Now All These Bitches is Nicki Fans”
“Money in the air it’s a festival Cause I ba-ba-ba-ba ball no testicles”
“Wanna Play Meet Me At The Fumble Line Cause Umma Ninja Cowabunga Time”
“She Gets No Burn No Smoking Sign Yea Metaphor Heaven Cause They Approve Nicki Like My Credit Score 7″
“I’mma need a coupleof those benz-ez-ez, I be up out China spendin Yenz-ez-ez, Gucci on my lens-ez-ez, my leather so sensetive, Scratch my 9 o’clock, I wanna shop, make it ten-tative”
“You can hate me but why knock my hussle, I’mma be the queen no matter how they shuffle, Skirts with the ruffle, Louie on the duffle, I’m a bad b*tch, no muzzle”
“Now I’m a dime, you a nickellete, Light skinned-ed pig-ament, stop copyrightin’ infringement, I eat these rap b*ches, somebody get me a dinner mint”
“I mean Tinker, tell n*gga link her, Cause I’m lookin’ for some good brain from a thinker”
“I keep three hoes, But don’t’call me Santa Anna-and I’m flyer than reindeers in the winter”
“Ask Rocko, ask Gucci, Gucci bandana, I’m a star, I’m the black Hannah Montana”
“Get me my limozine, all in your magazine, And when I come dem better lean like Promethazine”
“One Two Buckle My Shoe, No One On The Corner Has Swagga Like I Do”
“I never knew my titties was bigger than Pamela, So paparazzi flickin’ be flickin’ they camera”
“I’ma spit on it, then I’m gon sit on it, You can f*ck my girls too daddy, I’m kin-done-it (condone it)”
“When I come around it gets hotter than a soup kitchen, I’ll leave clips in your head like a beautician”
“Back to basics, bitch I been hot since Asics, And I’m tighter than face lifts, flier than spaceships”
“I’m from the Philipine, badder than Billy Gene, That’s why I get more head than a guillotine”
“I say I body b*tches, it means that b*tch got killed, Ridin’ the baseline like I’m Quile O’Neal ”
"I stay around the white like the Klu Klux Klan, stay around the sand butter pecan tan”
“So where my cash at, where my stash at?, I mean, where the Dow Jones, where the NASDAQ?”
“I’m bout that fast money, money ain’t got no patience, But if them boys come, run like you on probation”
“I only fuck with bad bitches. no homo”
“Every, every time I spit I mas-a-cre (masacre), So you better run quick like Nas-a-car (Nascar)”
“Yes I’m the girl that they hearda, I commit murda, I body bitches, I don’t need a burna”
“I’m the one! I’m the one, ya heard me?, The same number that’s stitched on McGrady’s jersey”
“My flow stupid; wheel chair bound, Take the small bus.. All year round”
“Tell Stack, to bring the black Carter, But If I f*ck em, would he? Would he yell ‘Squad Up!’”
“You’ll be gone to November like Wyclef, I move weight and I ain’t talkin’ bout biceps”
“I’m badder than the dude at the Neverland, Get the money green coupe with a lepre-can (leprechaun)”
